title: Krak Minute – Merriam Playground
content:
Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

Tyshawn Jones – Noseblunt – Fuckin Awesome ‘Hockey III’
Mark Gonzales – Wallie fifty – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Alex Olson – Wallie feeble – Supreme ‘Cherry’
Dylan Rieder – Wallie bs smith – Supreme ‘Cherry’
Unknown – Wallie 5-0 – Supreme ‘Cherry’
Unknown – Wallie fs blunt – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Tristan Funkhouser – Wallie fs nosegrind – DC ‘Street Sweeper’
Unknown – Wallie hurricane – Supreme ‘Cherry’
David Clark – Wallie fs feeble – TWS ‘The Cinematographer Project’
Unknown – Wallie fs 180 fakie 5-0 – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Ben Kadow – Switch wallie 5-0 – Joyride
Rowan Zorilla – Wallie nose to fifty, impossible switch fifty & nollie to switch smith – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Unknown – Fs barley grind – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Franky Villani – Bs barley grind – TWS ‘Duets’
Eric Koston – Nollie 180 switch 5-0 – Supreme ‘Cherry’
Austyn Gillette – Fakie ollie nosegrind – ‘Radiant Cure’ Former part
Silas Baxter-Neal – Fakie fs ollie to crook & fakie fs flip to bs 5-0 – Adidas ‘Away Days’
Sean Pablo – Bs 180 to tail & bs flip to switch crook – Supreme ‘Blessed’
Vincent Touzery – Fs flip to fakie 5-0 – Supreme ‘Blessed’
author: simon
